If they just ripped that R6 without watching the result, I guess that all are shitty as the source. "Do not make cookies from the dirt. They cannot taste good" my grandma have said.

Have you noticed how Arrow's (Scene-group) Greenberg in first incarnation has been 20 minutes shorter? Well, they "propered" their misdoings on cost of 240 TERABYTES burned in downloads of the first one, payed by the suckers all around.

Did they say Sorry? Nope...
But you or me would be crucified for that.
